original_text: Their king will leave Jerusalem when it starts to become dark. He will carry his things on his shoulder as he goes out. They will dig a hole in the wall for him to go through. He will cover his face so that he cannot see the land.
korean_text: 무리가 성벽을 뚫고 행장을 그리로 가지고 나가고 그 중에 왕은 어두울 때에 어깨에 행장을 메고 나가며 눈으로 땅을 보지 아니하려고 자기 얼굴을 가리리라 하라

sentences.original_text: when it starts to become dark
He will carry his things on his shoulder
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 물건들을 어깨에 짊어질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will dig a hole in the wall
so that he cannot see the land
